content: Hello. My husband's stop loss will be 12 months in september. They deployed to Iraq about a week after his ETS. My question is will he be eligible for the monthly $500 for any of his time? Thanks to all who respond!

title: New stop loss bill question

content: It is retroactive to October 1st 2008, so in theory he should get $500 per month stop lossed since that date. I've heard that the first payments won't be until May, possibly June. It should be a lump sum (in theory), but he needs to pay attention to his LES every month, and you both need to be patient, you know how military pay goes. I'm glad they've finally enacted the legislation, and that they plan to phase out the program. I was stop lossed 10 months, and only four months of that was since October 1st. But I'm not complaining about the money, just so long as Stop Loss ENDS soon, for the sake of people still serving.
